explains: vi. （猫，猫头鹰）捕鼠；[计]用鼠标在计算机屏幕上移动光标
wordGroup: cat and mouse 猫戏老鼠；恣意玩弄折磨（像猫对老鼠般）
nude mouse n. [医]裸鼠；裸小鼠；无毛鼠（指实验室中饲养的老鼠）
like a drowned mouse adv. 狼狈不堪

sentences.en: He moves the cursor, clicks the mouse.
The mouse ran away, squeaking with fear.
sentences.cn: 那只老鼠吓得尖叫着溜了。

sentences.en: A cat often plays with a mouse before the kill.
sentences.cn: 猫在咬死老鼠之前常常要耍弄它一番。
